variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm-git-archive
dependencies.description:
This is a setuptools_scm plugin that adds support for git archives (for
example the ones GitHub automatically generates).

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-nose
dependencies.description:
nose extends the test loading and running features of unittest, making
it easier to write, find and run tests.

dependencies.name: py-pytest
dependencies.description: pytest: simple powerful testing with Python.

dependent_to.name: py-psyclone
dependent_to.description:
Code generation for the PSyKAl framework from the GungHo project, as
used by the LFRic model at the UK Met Office.

dependent_to.name: py-dace
dependent_to.description:
DaCe is a fast parallel programming framework that takes code in
Python/NumPy and other programming languages, and maps it to high-
performance CPU, GPU, and FPGA programs, which can be optimized
programmatically or interactively.
